title: Old Injury - Novel Updates
tags: Abandoned Children   Abusive Characters   Adapted to Manhua   Adopted Children   Black Belly   Bloodlines   Businessmen   Child Abuse   Childcare   Cold Love Interests   Cruel Characters   Cute Children   First-time Interc**rse   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Misunderstandings   Mpreg   Mysterious Past   Omegaverse   Past Plays a Big Role   Past Trauma   Reverse R*pe   R*pe   Schemes And Conspiracies   Tragic Past
author: Hui Nan Que   回南雀
description:
'There is a scar on my stomach which is hard to heal over the years'..

Ning Yu is forced to marry Song Bai Lao, whom he was deeply entangled as a teenager. Because of the misunderstanding they had before, Song Bai Lao keeps bad-mouthing Ning Yu to the point that he even becomes Ning Yu’s nightmare. As they get together, Song Bai Lao finally confronts his feelings for Ning Yu, and Ning Yu finally sees his true feelings and sincerity.>
